the ending of time off for good behavior when sentanced to a prison term for crimes committed.
if a judge gives a offender a  prison sentance of any lengh ,he should serve every day of that sentance ie.5 years means 5 years to the day why should they get time off there sentance for being good when they broke the law in the first place

 IM SORRY TO SAY IT BUT EVERYONE I KNOW THINKS THE PRISONS OR A JOKE AND HOLIDAY CAMP, TIME TO END THIS FOR GOOD, AND THE END OF TIME OFF FOR GOOD BEHAVIOR IS A STEP IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION
